abstract: A short film made in 1943 that deals with the difficulties imposed by food rationing during World War Two.
description: Produced at the height of World War Two, this inspirational dramatised short shows the challenges and sacrifices imposed by food rationing. The experiences of front-line soldiers living on dehydrated food are contrasted with shortages facing the civilian population on the home front. Courtesy Cinesound Movietone Productions and Thought Equity Motion.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002533; A Call To Arms; Active; 2012
